description.message: Popups alternate texts of images or others like NetscapeCommunicator(Navigator) 4.x, and show long descriptions in the multi-row tooltip.

config.attrListEnabled.tooltip.message: If you check this, various attributes not only "alt" and "title" are also displayed in the tooltip.

config.attrList.label.before.message: List of attributes to be shown:

config.attrList.tooltip.message: Write name of attributes to be shown, delimited with "|".

config.attrListRecursively.tooltip.message: If you check this, all ancestor nodes are also scanned.

config.debug.tooltip.message: If you check this, debug logs will appear in the console.
